title: ArtyTorrent 102-Elab Ballistix Drum+Perc Oneshots-WAV
description:
ArtyTorrent 102-Elab Ballistix Drum+Perc Oneshots-WAV
-----------------------------------------------------

Ballistix comes as a double CD with audio and WAV versions of 1750 samples.
This torrent just contains drum and percussion oneshots that were used in the making of the loops in my previous pack, so we&#039;re talking thumping bass drums, ear-splitting snares, crusty hi-hats, and a few toms and congas.

Torrent contains 4 RARs with 656 oneshots
-----------------------------------------

Elab Ballistix hats (226)
Elab Ballistix kicks (219)
Elab Ballistix perc (22)
Elab Ballistix snares (189)

All files are normalized and acidized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz.
 
--
Arty - "How many snares does one man need?"
5th March 2008
